summary: The module provides a set of utilities for handling and manipulating text data within Django applications. It includes classes and functions for streaming text buffers, lazy string formatting, text truncation (both plain and HTML), safe string handling, HTML entity unescaping, filename sanitization, newline normalization, phone number conversion, and compression utilities.
business_intent: To simplify common text processing tasks in Django, ensuring safe and efficient handling of strings, especially in contexts like rendering templates, generating URLs, and managing file names.
